Definition: File Header Record
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Reporting Period of the data in the file (the “as of” month
and year)
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: The Date the file was created
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: Loan Liquidation Record
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
The CUSIP is a unique identification number permanently
assigned by the Committee on Uniform Securities
Identification Procedures (CUSIP) to each publicly traded
security at the time of issuance.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: The Pool identifier assigned by Ginnie Mae at pooling.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Identifies the Issue Type of the pool. Values are X, C, or
M
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Two-character pool type for the pool (see Ginnie Mae
Guide, Chapter 1)
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: The date the pool was issued
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
A number used for each loan to identify it distinctly for
data disclosures
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: The four-digit identifier for the current issuer responsible for the loan
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: Reporting Period of the data in the file.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Identifier of the government agency. Values are:
F = Federal Housing Administration
V = Veterans Administration
R = Rural Development
N = Native American
9 = Not Available
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Purpose of the loan. Values are:
1 = Purchase
2 = Refinance
3 = Loan Modification (HAMP)
4 = Loan Modification (non-HAMP)
9 = Not Available
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
The Original Principal Balance of the loan at pool
issuance. The value is truncated to the thousandths
place.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
The Unpaid Principal Balance (UPB) of the loan as of
the reporting period. This field will be blank if the loan
is removed within 6 months of pool issuance.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
The unscheduled remaining principal of the loan that
is being passed through, after taking into account
scheduled principal remitted. This field will be blank if
the loan is removed within 6 months of pool issuance.
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
Reason for removal of the loan. Values are:
1 = Mortgagor Payoff
2 = Repurchase of Delinquent Loan
3 = Foreclosure with Claim Payment
4 = Loss Mitigation
5 = Substitution
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: 6 = Other Removal
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: File Trailer Record
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition: Reporting Period of the data in the file
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf

Definition:
The number of loans/LR Records contained in the
file
File: llmonliq_MBS SF LOAN LIQUIDATIONS MONTHLY Layout V1.0 (Sep 2018 - Feb 2019).pdf
